get.description: Get a list of the example requests for the current hiring manager and culture.

parameters.name: x-beeline-client
parameters.description: The id of the client instance we are working on the behalf of.

parameters.name: x-beeline-user
parameters.description: The id of the user we are working on the behalf of.

parameters.name: x-beeline-culture
parameters.description: The culture value for this request.  Defaults to en_US.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset at which to start retrieving objects.

get.description: Get a single of the example of a request by it's id for the specified and culture.

parameters.name: x-beeline-client
parameters.description: The id of the client instance we are working on the behalf of.

parameters.name: x-beeline-user
parameters.description: The id of the user we are working on the behalf of.

parameters.name: x-beeline-culture
parameters.description: The culture value for this request.  Defaults to en_US.

get.description: Gets a list of durations supported by the VMS for the current culture.

parameters.name: x-beeline-client
parameters.description: The id of the client instance we are working on the behalf of.

parameters.name: x-beeline-user
parameters.description: The id of the user we are working on the behalf of.

parameters.name: x-beeline-culture
parameters.description: The culture value for this request.  Defaults to en_US.

200.description: An array of durations in the format of {count}{datepart} (ie: 1w, 14d, etc).  Valid dateparts are d = days, w = weeks, m = months, y = years.

post.description: Submits a request for creation by using an example request as a reference.

parameters.name: x-beeline-client
parameters.description: The id of the client instance we are working on the behalf of.

parameters.name: x-beeline-user
parameters.description: The id of the user we are working on the behalf of.

parameters.name: x-beeline-culture
parameters.description: The culture value for this request.  Defaults to en_US.

QuickRequestInfo.description: Represents a single request's information to be represented on a quick request card.

id.description: The system generated id for the request (ie: for cws this is the guid request id).

friendlyId.description: The user friendly identifier of the request (ie: 9302-1 for CWS).

jobTitle.description: The job title for the example request.

jobDescription.description: The job description for the example request.
jobDescription.example: Develops products by identifying potential products; conducting market research; generating product requirements; determining specifications, production timetables, pricing, and time-integrated plans for product introduction; developing marketing strategies.

properties.description: The properties to be displayed to the user describing a request (ie: 'Estimated Cost', 'Bill Rate' and 'Location').  The implementing VMS will decide which properties to provide.  The key's and value's will be displayed exactly as provided so it's the api's responsibility to ensure consistency with casing and date/currency formatting.

dateCreated.description: The UTC date and time that this date was created.

CreateRequestInfo.description: Represents the data required to create a request from a reference request.

id.description: The id of the reference request that will be copied.

startDate.description: The expected start date for the position this request is describing.

duration.description: The expected duration for the position this request is describing.  Should be formated as {count}{datepart} (ie: 1w, 14d, etc).  Valid dateparts are d = days, w = weeks, m = months, y = years.

CreateRequestSuccessInfo.description: Represents a sucessfull create quick request response.

id.description: The system generated id for the new request (ie: for cws this is the guid request id).

friendlyId.description: The user friendly identifier of the new request (ie: 9302-1 for CWS).

dashboardUrl.description: The url of the new requests dashbaord page.

VmsToken.name: Authorization
VmsToken.description: To be determined but will likely consist of a vms created token. Example: "bearer {token}"

tags.name: QuickRequest
tags.description: Resource to support all QuickRequest dialogs withing the Beeline Bot Gateway.
